# # The following directives modify normal HTTP response behavior to # handle known problems with browser implementations. # BrowserMatch “Mozilla/2“ nokeepalive BrowserMatch “MSIE 4.0b2;” nokeepalive downgrade-1.0 force-response-1.0 BrowserMatch “RealPlayer 4.0” force-response-1.0 BrowserMatch “Java/1\.0” force-response-1.0 BrowserMatch “JDK/1\.0” force-response-1.0

# # The following directive disables redirects on non-GET requests for # a directory that does not include the trailing slash. This fixes a # problem with Microsoft WebFolders which does not appropriately handle # redirects for folders with DAV methods. # Same deal with Apple’s DAV filesystem and Gnome VFS support for DAV. # BrowserMatch “Microsoft Data Access Internet Publishing Provider” redirect-carefully BrowserMatch “MS FrontPage” redirect-carefully BrowserMatch “^WebDrive” redirect-carefully BrowserMatch “^WebDAVFS/1.[012]” redirect-carefully BrowserMatch “^gnome-vfs/1.0“ redirect-carefully BrowserMatch “^XML Spy” redirect-carefully BrowserMatch “^Dreamweaver-WebDAV-SCM1” redirect-carefully
